Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class Ground

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.GroundInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Crops, Dirt, Fence, MamboMarieGrave, Tree
public abstract class Ground
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.GroundInterface, Capable, Printable
Class representing terrain type

      location - the current Location
      direction - the direction of the Ground from the Actor

    • canActorEnter

      public boolean canActorEnter​(Actor actor)
      Override this to implement impassable terrain, or terrain that is only passable if conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor to check
      Returns:
      true
